thread.title: Kendall Jenner's New Short Bob Debuts at La Perla's Spring 2017 Show - Vogue
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner's New Short Bob Debuts at La Perla's Spring 2017 Show - Vogue

title: Kendall Jenner's New Short Bob Debuts at La Perla's Spring 2017 Show - Vogue
text: Kendall Jenner Debuts a New Chin-Grazing Bob on the La Perla Runway February 10, 2017 3:26 AM by Calin Van Paris Photo: Courtesy of La Perla / @laperlalingerie Kendall Jenner is skilled in the art of the sensational social media revealâ€”so it's no surprise she's putting her talents to good use in time for fashion month. The model closed the La Perla show this evening with a freshly shorn new bob, her pin straight chop parted at center and barely brushing her shoulders. Having first shed several inches of her long black hair for Vogue's September issue last fall, she's been going progressively shorter since. And while tonight's surprise reveal arrives during a month known for its dramatic beauty change-ups, the sight of New York Fashion Week's first official supermodel makeover didn't fail to thrill. Is there a gamine pixie in her future? Stay tuned.
